title: Frame rate bug
body: So about half way through my second game of the day my frames dropped from 150+ FPS to 30-50 FPS, i mentioned it to my mate i was playing with and within the next 3 minutes his frames also dropped to 40 from 100+. I asked in /all chat and most players in the game were experiencing this problem. It's the second time it's happened now just wondering if other people are getting it aswell??

replies.body:
Hey there, 

Have you experienced this issue since? Are there any common conditions that occur prior to your fps dropping that don't occur/dont exist when your fps is fine?

Could you try running a client repair for me, let me know if this helps.
